member.summary: This error indicates that the request referred to a mailbox in another Active Directory site, but no Client Access servers in the destination site were of an acceptable product version to receive the request, and therefore the request could not be proxied.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNoFolderClassOverride
member.summary: This error occurs if you set the FolderClass property when you are creating an item other than a generic folder. For typed folders such as CalendarFolderType and TasksFolderType, the folder class is implied. Setting the folder class to a different folder type by using the UpdateFolder Operation results in the ErrorObjectTypeChanged response. Instead, use a generic folder type but set the folder class to the value that you require. Exchange Web Services will create the correct strongly typed folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNoFreeBusyAccess
member.summary: This error indicates that the caller does not have free/busy viewing rights on the Calendar folder in question.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNonExistentMailbox
member.summary: This error occurs in the following scenarios: The e-mail address is empty in CreateManagedFolder. The e-mail address does not refer to a valid account in a request that takes an e-mail address in the body or in the SOAP header, such as in an Exchange Impersonation call.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNonPrimarySmtpAddress
member.summary: This error occurs when a caller passes in a non-primary SMTP address. The response includes the correct SMTP address to use.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNoPropertyTagForCustomProperties
member.summary: This error indicates that MAPI properties in the custom range, 0x8000 and greater, cannot be referenced by property tags. You must use the PropertySetId property or the DistinguishedPropertySetId property together with the PropertyName or PropertyId properties.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNoPublicFolderReplicaAvailable
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNoPublicFolderServerAvailable
member.summary: Indicates that no public folder server was available to handle the request. The content was not available on the callers home public server (or they dont have one) and was not found on any replica servers.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNoRespondingCASInDestinationSite
member.summary: This error indicates that the request referred to a mailbox in another Active Directory site, but none of the Client Access servers in that site responded, and therefore the request could not be proxied.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNotDelegate
member.summary: This error indicates that the user is not a delegate for the mailbox. It is returned by the GetDelegate Operation, the RemoveDelegate Operation, and the UpdateDelegate Operation when the specified delegate user is not found in the list of delegates.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNotEnoughMemory
member.summary: This error indicates that the operation could not be completed because of insufficient memory.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorObjectTypeChanged
member.summary: This error occurs if the object type changed.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorOccurrenceCrossingBoundary
member.summary: This error occurs when the Start or End time of an occurrence is updated so that the occurrence is scheduled to happen earlier or later than the corresponding previous or next occurrence.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorOccurrenceTimeSpanTooBig
member.summary: This error indicates that the time allotment for a given occurrence overlaps with another occurrence of the same recurring item. This response also occurs when the length in minutes of a given occurrence is larger than Int32.MaxValue.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorOperationNotAllowedWithPublicFolderRoot
member.summary: This error indicates that the current operation is not valid for the public folder root.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorParentFolderIdRequired
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorParentFolderNotFound
member.summary: This error occurs in the CreateFolder Operation when the parent folder is not found.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPasswordChangeRequired
member.summary: This error indicates that you must change your password before you can access this mailbox. This occurs when a new account has been created and the administrator indicated that the user must change the password at first logon. You cannot update the password by using Exchange Web Services. You must use a tool such as Microsoft Office Outlook Web App to change your password.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPasswordExpired
member.summary: This error indicates that the password has expired. You cannot change the password by using Exchange Web Services. You must use a tool such as Outlook Web App to change your password.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPhoneNumberNotDialable
member.summary: Indicates that the phone number was not in the correct phone form.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPropertyUpdate
member.summary: This error indicates that the update failed because of invalid property values. The response message includes the invalid property paths.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorProxiedSubscriptionCallFailure
member.summary: This error indicates that the request referred to a subscription that exists on another Client Access server, but an attempt to proxy the request to that Client Access server failed.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorProxyCallFailed
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorProxyGroupSidLimitExceeded
member.summary: This error indicates that the request referred to a mailbox in another Active Directory site, and the original caller is a member of more than 3,000 groups.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorProxyRequestNotAllowed
member.summary: This error indicates that the request that Exchange Web Services sent to another Client Access server when trying to fulfill a GetUserAvailability request was invalid. This response code typically indicates that a configuration or rights error has occurred, or that someone tried unsuccessfully to mimic an availability proxy request.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorProxyRequestProcessingFailed
member.summary: This error indicates that Exchange Web Services tried to proxy an availability request to another Client Access server for fulfillment, but the request failed. This response can be caused by network connectivity issues or request timeout issues.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorProxyTokenExpired
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPublicFolderRequestProcessingFailed
member.summary: This error occurs when the recipient that was passed to the GetUserAvailability Operation is located on a computer that is running a version of Exchange Server that is earlier than Exchange 2007, and the request to retrieve free/busy information for the recipient from the public folder server failed.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPublicFolderServerNotFound
member.summary: This error occurs when the recipient that was passed to the GetUserAvailability Operation is located on a computer that is running a version of Exchange Server that is earlier than Exchange 2007, and the request to retrieve free/busy information for the recipient from the public folder server failed because the organizational unit did not have an associated public folder server.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorQueryFilterTooLong
member.summary: This error indicates that the search folder restriction may be valid, but it is not supported by EWS. Exchange Web Services limits restrictions to contain a maximum of 255 filter expressions. If you try to bind to an existing search folder that exceeds 255, this response code is returned.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorQuotaExceeded
member.summary: This error occurs when the mailbox quota is exceeded.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorReadEventsFailed
member.summary: This error is returned by the GetEvents Operation or push notifications when a failure occurs while retrieving event information. When this error is returned, the subscription is deleted. Re-create the event synchronization based on a last known watermark.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorReadReceiptNotPending
member.summary: This error is returned by the CreateItem Operation if an attempt was made to suppress a read receipt when the message sender did not request a read receipt on the message or if the message is in the Junk E-mail folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRecurrenceEndDateTooBig
member.summary: This error occurs when the end date for the recurrence is after 9/1/4500.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRecurrenceHasNoOccurrence
member.summary: This error occurs when the specified recurrence does not have any occurrence instances in the specified range.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRemoveDelegatesFailed
member.summary: This error indicates that the delegate list failed to be saved after delegates were removed.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRequestAborted
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRequestStreamTooBig
member.summary: This error occurs when the request stream is larger than 400 KB.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRequiredPropertyMissing
member.summary: This error is returned when a required property is missing in a CreateAttachment Operation request. The missing property URI is included in the response.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorResolveNamesInvalidFolderType
member.summary: This error indicates that the caller has specified a folder that is not a contacts folder to the ResolveNames Operation.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorResolveNamesOnlyOneContactsFolderAllowed
member.summary: This error indicates that the caller has specified more than one contacts folder to the ResolveNames Operation.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorResponseSchemaValidation
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRestrictionTooLong
member.summary: This error occurs if the restriction contains more than 255 nodes.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorRestrictionTooComplex
member.summary: This error occurs when the restriction cannot be evaluated by Exchange Web Services.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorResultSetTooBig
member.summary: This error indicates that the number of calendar entries for a given recipient exceeds the allowed limit of 1000. Reduce the window and try again.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidExchangeImpersonationHeaderData
member.summary: This error occurs during Exchange Impersonation when a caller does not specify a UPN, an e-mail address, or a user SID. This will also occur if the caller specifies one or more of those and the values are empty.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSavedItemFolderNotFound
member.summary: This error occurs when the SavedItemFolderId is not found.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSchemaValidation
member.summary: This error occurs when the request cannot be validated against the schema.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSearchFolderNotInitialized
member.summary: This error indicates that the search folder was created, but the search criteria were never set on the folder. This only occurs when you access corrupted search folders that were created by using another API or client. To fix this error, use the UpdateFolder Operation to set the SearchParameters to include the restriction that should be on the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSendAsDenied
member.summary: This error occurs when both of the following conditions occur: A user has been granted CanActAsOwner permissions but is not granted delegate rights on the principals mailbox. The same user tries to create and send an e-mail message in the principals mailbox by using the SendAndSaveCopy option. The result is an ErrorSendAsDenied error and the creation of the e-mail message in the principals Drafts folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSendMeetingCancellationsRequired
member.summary: This error is returned by the DeleteItem Operation if the SendMeetingCancellations attribute is missing from the request and the item to delete is a calendar item.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSendMeetingInvitationsOrCancellationsRequired
member.summary: This error is returned by the UpdateItem Operation if the SendMeetingInvitationsOrCancellations attribute is missing from the request and the item to update is a calendar item.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSendMeetingInvitationsRequired
member.summary: This error is returned by the CreateItem Operation if the SendMeetingInvitations attribute is missing from the request and the item to create is a calendar item.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSentMeetingRequestUpdate
member.summary: This error indicates that after the organizer sends a meeting request, the request cannot be updated. To modify the meeting, modify the calendar item, not the meeting request.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSentTaskRequestUpdate
member.summary: This error indicates that after the task initiator sends a task request, that request cannot be updated.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorServerBusy
member.summary: This error occurs when the server is busy.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorServiceDiscoveryFailed
member.summary: This error indicates that Exchange Web Services tried to proxy a user availability request to the appropriate forest for the recipient, but it could not determine where to send the request because of a service discovery failure.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorStaleObject
member.summary: This error occurs in an UpdateItem Operation or a SendItem Operation when the change key is not up-to-date or was not supplied. Call the GetItem Operation to retrieve an updated change key and then try the operation again.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSubmissionQuotaExceeded
member.summary: Indicates that a user cannot immediately send more request because the submission quota has been reached.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSubscriptionAccessDenied
member.summary: This error occurs when you try to access a subscription by using an account that did not create that subscription. Each subscription can only be accessed by the creator of the subscription.\

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSubscriptionDelegateAccessNotSupported
member.summary: This error indicates that you cannot create a subscription if you are not the owner or do not have owner access to the mailbox.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSubscriptionNotFound
member.summary: This error occurs if the subscription that corresponds to the specified SubscriptionId is not found. The subscription may have expired, the Exchange Web Services process may have been restarted, or an invalid subscription was passed in. If the subscription was valid, re-create the subscription with the latest watermark. This is returned by the Unsubscribe Operation or the GetEvents Operation responses.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSubscriptionUnsubscribed
member.summary: Indicates that the client is not subscribed to the subscription.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSyncFolderNotFound
member.summary: This error is returned by the SyncFolderItems Operation if the parent folder that is specified cannot be found.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxNotFound
member.summary: The site mailbox was not found. The ErrorTeamMailboxNotFound field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxNotLinkedToSharePoint
member.summary: The site mailbox is not linked to an online team portal. The ErrorTeamMailboxNotLinkedToSharePoint field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxUrlValidationFailed
member.summary: The site mailbox URL validation failed. The ErrorTeamMailboxUrlValidationFailed field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxNotAuthorizedOwner
member.summary: The associated action can be done only by an authorized owner of the site mailbox. The ErrorTeamMailboxNotAuthorizedOwner field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxActiveToPendingDelete
member.summary: A site mailbox has not been closed prior to setting its TeamMailboxLifecycleState enumeration value to PendingDelete. The ErrorTeamMailboxActiveToPendingDelete field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxFailedSendingNotifications
member.summary: The site mailbox failed to send notifications. The ErrorTeamMailboxFailedSendingNotifications field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTeamMailboxErrorUnknown
member.summary: The site mailbox error is unknown. The ErrorTeamMailboxErrorUnknown field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTimeIntervalTooBig
member.summary: This error indicates that the time window that was specified is larger than the allowed limit. By default, the allowed limit is 42.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTimeoutExpired
member.summary: This error occurs when there is not enough time to complete the processing of the request.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorToFolderNotFound
member.summary: This error indicates that the destination folder does not exist.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorTokenSerializationDenied
member.summary: This error occurs if the caller tries to do a Token serialization request but does not have the ms-Exch-EPI-TokenSerialization right on the Client Access server.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUpdatePropertyMismatch
member.summary: This error occurs when the single property path that is listed in a change description does not match the single property that is being set within the actual ItemType or FolderType object.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnifiedMessagingDialPlanNotFound
member.summary: Indicates that a user's dial plan is not available.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnifiedMessagingRequestFailed
member.summary: Indicates that the user could not be found.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnifiedMessagingServerNotFound
member.summary: Indicates that a valid server for the dial plan can be found to handle the request.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnableToGetUserOofSettings
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedSubFilter
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedCulture
member.summary: This error occurs when you try to set the Culture property to a value that is not parsable by the System.Globalization.CultureInfo class.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedMapiPropertyType
member.summary: This error occurs when a caller tries to use extended properties of types object, object array, error, or null.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedMimeConversion
member.summary: This error occurs when you are trying to retrieve or set MIME content for an item other than a PostItemType, MessageType, or CalendarItemType object.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedPathForQuery
member.summary: This error occurs when the caller passes a property that is invalid for a query. This can occur when calculated properties are used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedPathForSortGroup
member.summary: This error occurs when the caller passes a property that is invalid for a sort or group by property. This can occur when calculated properties are used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedPropertyDefinition
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedQueryFilter
member.summary: This error indicates that the search folder restriction may be valid, but it is not supported by EWS.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedRecurrence
member.summary: This error indicates that the specified recurrence is not supported for tasks.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUnsupportedTypeForConversion
member.summary: This error indicates that Exchange Web Services found a property type in the store but it cannot generate XML for the property type.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUpdateDelegatesFailed
member.summary: This error indicates that the delegate list failed to be saved after delegates were updated.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUserNotUnifiedMessagingEnabled
member.summary: Indicates that the requester is not enabled.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorVoiceMailNotImplemented
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorValueOutOfRange
member.summary: Indicates that a calendar view start date or end date was set to 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM or 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorVirusDetected
member.summary: This error indicates that the Exchange store detected a virus in the message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorVirusMessageDeleted
member.summary: This error indicates that the Exchange store detected a virus in the message and deleted it.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorWebRequestInInvalidState
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorWin32InteropError
member.summary: This error indicates that there was an internal failure during communication with unmanaged code.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorWorkingHoursSaveFailed
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorWorkingHoursXmlMalformed
member.summary: This response code is not used.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorWrongServerVersion
member.summary: Indicates that a request can be made only to a server that is the same version as the mailbox server.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorWrongServerVersionDelegate
member.summary: Indicates that a request was made by a delegate that has a different server version than the principal's mailbox server.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorDuplicateSOAPHeader
member.summary: Indicates that there are duplicate SOAP headers.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSharingSynchronizationFailed
member.summary: Indicates that an attempt at synchronizing a sharing folder failed. This error code is returned when: the subscription for a sharing folder is not found; the sharing folder is not found; the corresponding directory user is not found; the user no longer exists; the appointment is invalid; the contact item is invalid; there is a communication failure with the remote server.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorSharingNoExternalEwsAvailable
member.summary: Indicates that the external URL property has not been set in the Active Directory directory service database.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorFreeBusyDLLimitReached
member.summary: Indicates that the maximum group member count has been reached for obtaining free/busy information for a distribution list.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidGetSharingFolderRequest
member.summary: Indicates that the DataType and ShareFolderId elements are both present in a request.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNotAllowedExternalSharingByPolicy
member.summary: Indicates that the caller attempted to grant permissions in its calendar or contacts folder to a user in another organization but the attempt failed.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUserNotAllowedByPolicy
member.summary: Indicates that the requester attempted to grant permissions in its calendar or contacts folder to an external user, but the sharing policy assigned to the requester indicates that the domain of the external user is not listed in the policy.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorPermissionNotAllowedByPolicy
member.summary: Indicates that the requester attempted to grant permissions in its calendar or contacts folder to an external user, but the sharing policy assigned to the requester indicates that the requested permission level is higher is than what the sharing policy allows.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorOrganizationNotFederated
member.summary: Indicates that the requester's organization is not federated, so the requester cannot create sharing messages to send to an external user or cannot accept sharing messages received from an external user.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorMailboxFailover
member.summary: Indicates that an attempt to access a mailbox failed because the mailbox is in a failover process.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidExternalSharingInitiator
member.summary: Indicates that the sharing invitation sender did not create the sharing invitation metadata.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorMessageTrackingPermanentError
member.summary: Indicates that the message tracking service cannot track the message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorMessageTrackingTransientError
member.summary: Indicates that the message tracking service is either down or busy. This error code indicates a transient error. When clients receive this error, they can try again to connect to the server.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorMessageTrackingNoSuchDomain
member.summary: Indicates that the specified domain cannot be found.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorUserWithoutFederatedProxyAddress
member.summary: Indicates that the requester's organization has a set of federated domains but the requester's organization does not have any SMTP proxy addresses with one of the federated domains.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidOrganizationRelationshipForFreeBusy
member.summary: Indicates that a caller requested free/busy information for a user in another organization but the organizational relationship does not have free/busy enabled.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidFederatedOrganizationId
member.summary: Indicates that the requestor's organization federation objects are not properly configured.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidExternalSharingSubscriber
member.summary: Indicates that a sharing message is not intended for the caller.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidSharingData
member.summary: Indicates that the sharing metadata is not valid. This can be caused by invalid XML.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorInvalidSharingMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the sharing message is not valid. This can be caused by a missing property.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ResponseCode.ErrorNotSupportedSharingMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the sharing message is not supported.

member.summary: The maximum number of mailboxes allowed in a search query has been exceeded. The ErrorSearchTooManyMailboxes field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

member.summary: Indicates whether incoming messages must be permission controlled (RMS protected) in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.IsReadReceipt
member.summary: Indicates whether incoming messages must be read receipts in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.IsSigned
member.summary: Indicates whether incoming messages must be S/MIME signed in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.IsVoiceMail
member.summary: Indicates whether incoming messages must be voice mail messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.ItemClasses
member.summary: Represents the item classes that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.MessageClassifications
member.summary: Represents the message classifications that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.NotSentToMe
member.summary: Indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must not be in the ToRecipients property of the incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.SentCcMe
member.summary: Indicates whether the owner of the mailbox has to be in the CcRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.SentOnlyToMe
member.summary: Indicates whether the owner of the mailbox has to be the only one in the ToRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.SentToAddresses
member.summary: Indicates the e-mail addresses that incoming messages have to have been sent to in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.SentToMe
member.summary: Indicates whether the owner of the mailbox has to be in the ToRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.SentToOrCcMe
member.summary: Indicates whether the owner of the mailbox has to be in either a ToRecipients or CcRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.Sensitivity
member.summary: Indicates the sensitivity that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.WithinDateRange
member.summary: Specifies the date range within which incoming messages have to have been received in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Exchange.RuleConditions.WithinSizeRange
member.summary: Specifies the minimum and maximum sizes that incoming messages must be in order for the condition or exception to apply.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel
member.summary: Represents the permission level that a user has on a folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.Owner
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create, read, edit, and delete all items in the folder, and create subfolders. The user is both folder owner and folder contact.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.PublishingEditor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create, read, edit, and delete all items in the folder, and create subfolders.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.Editor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create, read, edit, and delete all items in the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.PublishingAuthor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create and read all items in the folder, edit and delete only items that the user creates, and create subfolders.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.Author
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create and read all items in the folder, and edit and delete only items that the user creates.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.NoneditingAuthor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create and read all items in the folder, and delete only items that the user creates.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.Reviewer
member.summary: Indicates that the user can read all items in the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.Contributor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create items in the folder. The contents of the folder do not appear.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.Custom
member.summary: Indicates that the user has custom access permissions on the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.PermissionLevel.None
member.summary: Indicates that the user has no permissions on the folder.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag
member.summary: Defines Mapi Property Tag constants

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_MODE
member.summary: Contains the identifier of the mode for message acknowledgment.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_ALTERNATE_RECIPIENT_ALLOWED
member.summary: Contains TRUE if the sender permits autoforwarding of this message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_AUTHORIZING_USERS
member.summary: Contains a list of entry identifiers for users who have authorized the sending of a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_AUTO_FORWARD_COMMENT
member.summary: Contains a comment added by the autoforwarding agent.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_AUTO_FORWARDED
member.summary: Contains TRUE if an automatic agent has forwarded a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONTENT_CONFIDENTIALITY_ALGORITHM_ID
member.summary: Contains an identifier for the algorithm used to confirm message content confidentiality.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONTENT_CORRELATOR
member.summary: Contains a value the message sender can use to match a report with the original message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONTENT_IDENTIFIER
member.summary: Contains a key value that enables the message recipient to identify its content.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONTENT_LENGTH
member.summary: Contains a message length, in bytes, passed to a client application or service provider to determine if a message of that length can be delivered.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONTENT_RETURN_REQUESTED
member.summary: Contains TRUE if a message should be returned with a nondelivery report.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONVERSATION_KEY
member.summary: The obsolete precursor of the PR_CONVERSATION_INDEX and PR_CONVERSATION_TOPIC properties. No longer supported.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONVERSION_EITS
member.summary: Contains the encoded information types (EITs) that are applied to a message in transit to describe conversions.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONVERSION_WITH_LOSS_PROHIBITED
member.summary: Contains TRUE if a message transfer agent (MTA) is prohibited from making message text conversions that lose information.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_CONVERTED_EITS
member.summary: Contains an identifier for the types of text in a message after conversion.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_DEFERRED_DELIVERY_TIME
member.summary: Contains the date and time at which a message sender wants a message delivered.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_DELIVER_TIME
member.summary: Contains the date and time at which the original message was delivered.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_DISCARD_REASON
member.summary: Contains a reason why a message transfer agent (MTA) has discarded a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_DISCLOSURE_OF_RECIPIENTS
member.summary: Contains TRUE if disclosure of recipients is allowed.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_DL_EXPANSION_HISTORY
member.summary: Contains a history showing how a distribution list has been expanded during message transmission.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_DL_EXPANSION_PROHIBITED
member.summary: Contains TRUE if a message transfer agent (MTA) is prohibited from expanding distribution lists.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_EXPIRY_TIME
member.summary: Contains the date and time at which the messaging system can invalidate the content of a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_IMPLICIT_CONVERSION_PROHIBITED
member.summary: Contains TRUE if a message transfer agent (MTA) is prohibited from making implicit message text conversions.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_IMPORTANCE
member.summary: Contains a value indicating the message sender's opinion of the importance of a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_IPM_ID
member.summary: Was originally meant to contain an X.400 identifier of an interpersonal message. No longer supported.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_LATEST_DELIVERY_TIME
member.summary: Contains the latest date and time when a message transfer agent (MTA) should deliver a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.MapiPropertyTag.PR_MESSAGE_CLASS

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag
member.summary: Contains a value that indicates the origin and current state of a message.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.Associated
member.summary: The message is an associated message of a folder. The client or provider has read-only access to this flag. The Read flag is ignored for associated messages, which do not retain a read/unread state.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.FromMe
member.summary: The messaging user sending was the messaging user receiving the message. This flag is meant to be set by the transport provider.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.HasAttachment
member.summary: The message has at least one attachment. The client has read-only access to this flag.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.NonReadReportPending
member.summary: A nonread report needs to be sent for the message. The client or provider has read-only access to this flag.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.OriginInternet
member.summary: The incoming message arrived over the Internet. It originated either outside the organization or from a source the gateway cannot consider trusted. The client should display an appropriate message to the user. Transport providers set this flag; the client has read-only access.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.OriginMiscExternal
member.summary: The incoming message arrived over an external link other than X.400 or the Internet. It originated either outside the organization or from a source the gateway cannot consider trusted. The client should display an appropriate message to the user. Transport providers set this flag; the client has read-only access.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.OriginX400
member.summary: The incoming message arrived over an X.400 link. It originated either outside the organization or from a source the gateway cannot consider trusted. The client should display an appropriate message to the user. Transport providers set this flag; the client has read-only access.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.Read
member.summary: The message is marked as having been read. This flag is ignored if the Associated flag is set.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.Resend
member.summary: The message includes a request for a resend operation with a non-delivery report.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.ReadReportPending
member.summary: A read report needs to be sent for the message. The client or provider has read-only access to this flag.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.Submit
member.summary: The message is marked for sending. Message store providers set this flag; the client has read-only access.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.Unmodified
member.summary: The outgoing message has not been modified since the first time that it was saved; the incoming message has not been modified since it was delivered.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Msg.MessageFlag.Unsent
member.summary: The message is still being composed. It is saved, but has not been sent. Typically, this flag is cleared after the message is sent.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Msg.Message.Priority
member.summary: Contains the relative priority of a message.
member.remarks: This property and the property should not be confused. Importance indicates a value to users, while priority indicates the order or speed at which the message should be sent by the messaging system software. Higher priority usually indicates a higher cost. Higher importance usually is associated with a different display by the user interface.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Msg.Message.MessageFlags
member.summary: Contains a bitmask of flags that indicate the origin and current state of a message.
member.remarks: This property is a nontransmittable message property exposed at both the sending and receiving ends of a transmission, with different values depending upon the client application or store provider involved. This property is initialized by the client or message store provider when a message is created and saved for the first time and then updated periodically by the message store provider, a transport provider, and the MAPI spooler as the message is processed and its state changes. This property exists on a message both before and after submission, and on all copies of the received message. Although it is not a recipient property, it is exposed differently to each recipient according to whether it has been read or modified by that recipient.

member.summary: Meeting requests are forwarded to the delegate and moved to the Deleted Items folder in the principal's mailbox.

member.summary: Meeting requests are forwarded to the delegate and remain in the Inbox folder in the principal's mailbox.

member.summary: Meeting requests are forwarded to the delegate and remain in the Inbox folder in the principal's mailbox, but the Accept, Tentative, and Decline buttons do not appear in the Microsoft Office Outlook reading pane.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.DeliverMeetingRequests.None
member.summary: Meeting requests are not forwarded to the delegate.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel
member.summary: Represents the permission level that a user has on a Calendar folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.Owner
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create, read, edit, and delete all items in the folder, and create subfolders. The user is both folder owner and folder contact.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.PublishingEditor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create, read, edit, and delete all items in the folder, and create subfolders.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.Editor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create, read, edit and delete all items in the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.PublishingAuthor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create and read all items in the folder, edit and delete only items that the user creates, and create subfolders.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.Author
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create and read all items in the folder, and edit and delete only items that the user creates.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.NoneditingAuthor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create and read all items in the folder, and delete only items that the user creates.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.Reviewer
member.summary: Indicates that the user can read all items in the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.Contributor
member.summary: Indicates that the user can create items in the folder. The contents of the folder do not appear.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.FreeBusyTimeOnly
member.summary: Indicates that the user can view only free/busy time within the calendar.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.FreeBusyTimeAndSubjectAndLocation
member.summary: Indicates that the user can view free/busy time within the calendar and the subject and location of appointments.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.Custom
member.summary: Indicates that the user has custom access permissions on the folder.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.CalendarPermissionLevel.None
member.summary: Indicates that the user has no permissions on the folder.

member.summary: Represents the quality of the suggested meeting time.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.SuggestionQuality.Excellent
member.summary: 100 percent of users and resources are available for the suggested meeting time.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.SuggestionQuality.Good
member.summary: The minimum percentage of users and resources available is equal to or greater than the GoodThreshold element value plus 50.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.SuggestionQuality.Fair
member.summary: The maximum percentage of users and resources available for a suggested meeting time is equal to the GoodThreshold element value plus 50. The minimum value for a Fair quality meeting time is 50 percent.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.SuggestionQuality.Poor
member.summary: Less than 50 percent of the users and resources are available for the suggested meeting time.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.SuggestionQuality.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType
member.summary: Indicates which action will be performed on a conversation.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.AlwaysCategorize
member.summary: The current items and new items in the conversation will automatically be set with the categories identified in the Categories element.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.AlwaysDelete
member.summary: The current items and new items in the conversation will automatically be deleted. The deletion mode is set by the DeleteType element.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.AlwaysMove
member.summary: The current items and new items in the conversation will automatically be moved to the folder identified by the DestinationFolderId element.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.Delete
member.summary: The current items in the conversation will be deleted. Subsequent items in the conversation will not be deleted. The deletion mode is set by the DeleteType element.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.Move
member.summary: The current items in the conversation will be moved to the folder identified by the DestinationFolderId element. Subsequent items in the conversation will not be moved.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.Copy
member.summary: The current items in the conversation will be copied to the folder identified by the DestinationFolderId element. Subsequent items in the conversation will not be copied.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Exchange.ConversationActionType.SetReadState
member.summary: The current items in the conversation will have their read state set. The read state is set by the IsRead element.
